solution_line_template: The total number of flyers Belinda's friends passed out was {flyers_ryan} by Ryan + {flyers_alyssa} by Alyssa + {flyers_scott} by Scott = <<{flyers_ryan}+{flyers_alyssa}+{flyers_scott}={friends_total_flyers}>>{friends_total_flyers} flyers.
Belinda passed out {total_flyers} total flyers - {friends_total_flyers} flyers passed out by friends = <<{total_flyers}-{friends_total_flyers}={belinda_flyers}>>{belinda_flyers} flyers.
To express this as a decimal, divide Belinda's {belinda_flyers} flyers / {total_flyers} total flyers = <<{belinda_flyers}/{total_flyers}={belinda_fraction}>>{belinda_fraction}.
Belinda passed out {belinda_fraction} x {percent_factor}% = {belinda_percent}% of the flyers.
